nodes.bodyText: Could we add the block number and short hash to the log message? It could help when grep over the log lines. I'm not sure about the current format (there is a pull request that standardize the format)
Added it directly as MDC keys to the whole block processing
Wouldn't be better if we wrap-up org.slf4j.MDC with an own implementation? Kind of helper or sthg?
AFAIR, this is an auxiliary class, which its only real use is in regtest. Maybe we could add also the name of the thread to MinerServer, it has a thread

Yes, but still, it's nice to have the logs in regtest. I didn't add the name to the MinerSever thread... because the name is already set: https://github.com/rsksmart/rskj/blob/master/rskj-core/src/main/java/co/rsk/mine/MinerServerImpl.java#L194
